Company: Berkshire Power Company LLC and Power Plant Management Services LLC

Description: Berkshire Power Plant's owner and management company agreed to plead guilty to tampering with emissions equipment and submitting false information to both environmental and energy regulators.

Berkshire Power Co., the owner of Berkshire Power Plant, and Power Plant Management Services, the Plant manager, agreed to plead guilty to state and federal felony charges that they violated and conspired to violate the federal Clean Air Act and agreed to pay a total of $4.25 million in fines and community service payments. The resolution as also announced by the Justice Department; see the Violation Tracker entry at https://violationtracker.goodjobsfirst.org/violation-tracker/ma-berkshire-power-co
